lines.text: Never scald your tongue on another man's soup.
don't listen to old Italian sayings.
I got a new game. Everybody dies.
How was California?
Sunny.
Sunny? You've been out there two years and that's all you've got to say?
The Simpsons are on an hour earlier.
I've never had a woman partner before.
Neither have I.
Why did you change your testimony?
Why do you think?
You cheat good.
You shot your own son? There goes that gold watch
[last lines]
Grandkids, Dad.
Do you know what my dad used to say? Loyalty before all else exept honor.

[while lying in bed with Tom]
We shouldn't be doing this - we're partners.
We should be shot.
We should shoot each other.
Too much paperwork.
Maybe you need a drink to ease the pain of being wrong!
Loyalty above all else... except honor.

[after being gone for two years, Danny has just sneaked onto Hardy's houseboat in the middle of the night... Hardy believes it to be just another burglar... now hushed with gun drawn]
You picked the wrong house to rob, asshole.
Who are you kiddin', Tommy? You ain't got nothing worth stealing.

[Eiler comes up to Hardy to unlock his handcuffs after the showdown with Jimmy at the river... Hardy hands the cuffs to Eiler, who shakes his head slowly]
I was a real shithead, Tommy. Perhaps you want to take a swing at me.
What good would it do, Eddie?
[thinks for a moment, then delivers a right hook to Eiler's jaw]
On the other hand...
[walks off]

[Hardy, hobbling on a crutch, arrives at the bridge, where Jimmy is preparing to jump after being arraigned on charges of police brutality on Hardy's own testimony... Eiler is at the bridge]
What, you're going to give him a push?
You belong on the river, you fuckin' rat!

[Jimmy and Hardy are fighting on the bridge after the boat chase on the river... Hardy has the chain of his handcuffs around Jimmy's neck]
You like to jump off bridges?
No, of course not
[Hardy pulls both of them off the bridge and into the river below]

[During a car chase]
He sure drives like a cop
[repeatedl line]
Now we gotta us a game.
Did you get fucked? Because Tommy's made a living out of fucking his partners
Who's the best cop?
You Jimmy... always you

[as Jimmy is electrocuted]
Who's the best cop now?
[first lines]
The search for the Polish Hill Strangler continues in the wake of the discovery of yet a fourth victim early this morning.
Let me rephrase it
[repeated line]
